targets.rawQuery:
SELECT highest_synced_checkpoint, hostname, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time > ago(1h) and hostname='$hostnames'
ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT certificates_created, hostname, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time > ago(1h) and hostname='$hostnames'
ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT current_round, hostname, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time > ago(1h) and hostname='$hostnames'
ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT epoch_time_left, hostname, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time > ago(1h) and hostname='$hostnames'
ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT memory
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table WHERE hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT db_disk
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table WHERE hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT disk
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT cpu
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT swap
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT uptime
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT hostname, avg(net_in) as netIn, avg(net_out) as netOut, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
  FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time > ago(3h) and hostname='$hostnames'
 GROUP BY hostname, bin(time, 1m)
 ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT hostname, avg(cpu) AS avg_cpu,
       avg(memory) AS avg_memory, avg(disk) AS avg_disk, avg(db_disk) as avg_dbdisk,
       avg(swap) AS avg_swap, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
  FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time > ago(3h) and hostname='$hostnames'
 GROUP BY hostname, bin(time, 1m)
 ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT avg(db_disk) AS avg_dbdisk,
       avg(disk) AS avg_disk, bin(time, 1m) AS binned_time
  FROM $__database.$__table
  WHERE time > ago(3h) and hostname='$hostnames'
 GROUP BY hostname, bin(time, 1m)
 ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT curr_epoch
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT curr_stake
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT MAX(curr_stake) as stake, bin(time, 24h) AS binned_time
FROM testDB.suimon
WHERE time > ago(14d) and hostname='$hostnames'
GROUP BY bin(time, 24h)
ORDER BY binned_time

SELECT MAX(stake_total/1000) as selfstake, curr_epoch
FROM testDB.suimon
WHERE time > ago(7d) and hostname='$hostnames'
GROUP BY curr_epoch
ORDER BY curr_epoch

SELECT commission
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT stake_total/1000
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT current_round
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT highest_synced_checkpoint
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT last_executed_checkpoint
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT certificates_created
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT gas_price
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

SELECT curr_voted_gas
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE time=(SELECT max(time) FROM $__database.$__table where hostname='$hostnames') and hostname='$hostnames'

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT hostname FROM "testDB"."suimon" WHERE time > ago(15m)
list.name: hostnames
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT hostname FROM "testDB"."suimon" WHERE time > ago(15m)
